Description: Lamp (fragment). With foliate ornament. Made of green glazed (corroded) and carved pottery (grey-buff).
Curator's comments: Cf. R. Mason & J. Tugwell, 'Fatimid Tall-Necked Lamps and Their Associates: A Typology', Journal of the American Research Center in Egypt 47 (2011) 335-53, esp. 341-2.
